alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Erie; Huron; Lorain; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Richland, Huron, Erie, northwestern Ashland and southwestern Lorain Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Norwalk, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwalk, Grafton, Willard, Wellington, New London, Milan, Wakeman, Savannah, Oberlin, Lagrange, Pittsfield, Greenwich, Berlin Heights, North Fairfield, Kipton, Rochester and Shenandoah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
